REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0791 reute h f BC-SONO-TEK-IN-INITIAL-O 03-06 0045

TEXT.TITLE: SONO-TEK IN INITIAL OFFERING
TEXT.BODY: <Sono-Tek Corp> said it began an initial public offering of 400,000 shares at a price of five dlrs per share. Proceeds will be used to repay debt, product development, expansion of facilities and working capital. Reuter
